mapper.select: SELECT md.CREATION_ID, md.TITLE, md.IMAGE_URL, md.CREATED_AT FROM creation c JOIN music_data md ON c.CREATION_ID = md.CREATION_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId} AND c.ART_FORM = #{artForm} ORDER BY md.CREATED_AT

SELECT creation_id, title, lyric, audio_url as audioUrl, image_url as imageUrl, model_name as modelName, gpt_description_prompt as gptDescriptionPrompt, type, tags, created_at as createdAt, error_message as errorMessage FROM music_data WHERE creation_id = #{creationId}
